listitem.para: Generates the following error on DreamHost servers (and possible others) at different places in the file: Warning: Call-time pass-by-reference has been deprecated; If you would like to pass it by reference, modify the declaration of xml_set_object(). If you would like to enable call-time pass-by-reference, you can set allow_call_time_pass_reference to true in your INI file. in /home/.zerlina/dkeenan/upc.dankeenan.org/xmlrpc.inc
